thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 7 de 669
thread.title: Harry Tallon

author: Harry Tallon
title: Harry Tallon
text: Goldcar provides a good and efficient service. There website is easy to navigate. I had a 10% discount as a result of my members points. There was no opportunity to input the code for the discount. It may be that since I chose the crazy price option this was not available. However this was not made clear anywhere. I don't really know why there was no opportunity to input the code before paying.
